website_summaries.verdict: If you want the ease of fruit snacks and the peace of mind organic offers, try the Annie's.
pros: These are made with natural fruit juice
Variety pack allows you to sample the flavors
cons: The flavor is not as strong as some other fruit snacks available

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not enough snacks for the money. the bags are very tiny.
customer_reviews.author: The Dad Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting gummies
customer_reviews.text: This a very tasty gummy snack! Nice texture and flavors, while not overly sweet. I got the variety pack as let me try different flavors. Citrus and strawberry were my favorite, so in the future I will be buying those individual flavors. Ali Julia review
customer_reviews.author: Ali Julia

customer_reviews.title: The flavor of them is absolutely wonderful though. Everyone that I had try them agreed ...
customer_reviews.text: I adore these, but they definitely aren't for everyone. Don't buy these expecting the typical texture of a gummy. They are almost more.. jello-esq. The flavor of them is absolutely wonderful though. Everyone that I had try them agreed the flavor was great but most of them couldn't get past the odd texture. I, however, love it, as they are much easier to chew then other gummies I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Mcbunny

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding taste and fresh softness for vegans!
customer_reviews.text: Annie's Organic Bunny Fruit Snacks are delicious. They have great taste, and my fruit snacks are very fresh and soft. For me, they're more tasty than gummy bears. I used to love gummy bears, but I gave them up because they contain gelatin. Annie's fruit snacks are much more moist and soft than gummy bears. I only wish they weren't quite so expensive. If I had known about these treats, I would have used them for Halloween. I try to give out the healthiest and tastiest item that I can find for the trick-or-treaters. Yummy treat for vegans!
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE these wonderful fruit snacks!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! I have recently switched to completely organic! I was still buying GMO Snacks for my kids,there is not a good selection of organic at our grocery store! My kids tried these,all 6 kids and loved them! I highly recommend and I am glad I found them a wonderful treat without chemicals to feed them! I love the fact this product has the project non-GMO butterfly on it and is certified organic! I tried them myself and I was very happy with them. I also love the fact they are very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M

customer_reviews.title: They were slimy goo upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I love Annie's gummies. These however arrived melter or something. I have bags of slimy mis-shaped goo that tastes gritty.I cant pack them with my kids because its slime. It may have been a fluke
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Sugary to the max - yuck
customer_reviews.text: I would not give these to kids. These are way too sweet and not palatable. They are hard to eat. It's too bad, because the ingredients are decent, but they over did it with the sugar. They are a little sickeningly sweet compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Woodland Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Not gummy
customer_reviews.text: These are great fruit snacks if you are just wanting something fruity but they will not have the same texture as gummy bears ect. Still trying to find a good gelatin free gummy fruit snack. This isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Organic!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, color, & texture. Easy to chew. More satisfying/ filling than other gummy snacks we've bought. I've been looking for better snack options for my family. Switching to actively seeking to purchase organic, healthier products. I'm not sure why I assumed this brand wouldn't taste good but I was wrong. Happily so! My children & I all really love these snacks. Affordable organic is very important to us as we still have to maintain a budget. These products are expensive in the grocery store but very affordable online. We are sincerely grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Bite-Size Snack in Very Small Packets
customer_reviews.text: I liked all the flavors (got the variety pack) and Annie's is a good healthy brand with non-GMO ingredients. I was surprised and disappointed at how small each serving packet was though. Each packet contains about a dozen pieces of bunny fruit snacks. They are a healthy snack but the size is more appropriate for small children who are old enough to safely swallow chewy foods to prevent choking.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: great vegan snack
customer_reviews.text: i'm not vegan but i've wanted to start removing certain things from my diet. this is a great replacement for gummy candies, i will say that you have to get used to the texture because it's a lot softer than normal gummies and the flavors can be a tad bit off but i'm sure its just because i'm used to gummies that have gelatin.
customer_reviews.author: WeLoveNae

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Would love to rate these "4.5", but not a direct option...the flavor is, frankly, mind expanding! Everything about these snacks is a solid "5" (would like to go higher!), with the notable exception of the texture; unlike any other gummi/fruit snack that I have experienced. Hard to describe, but they "break down" unexpectedly easily as they're chewed; somehow not as firm/solid as one anticipates. Not necessarily a complaint or negative comment, just an observation. Will definitely be a "go-to" in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Typically these fruit snacks are awesome. The entire package we received had old gummies in them The fruit snacks basically inedible because they have a weird film on them. I will go back to Whole Foods to buy this brand. This is the second crap shipment I have received.
customer_reviews.author: couturecutie84

customer_reviews.title: This is a good tasting candy, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is great, I won’t lie. I ordered it twice, however, BOTH times this candy was shipped to me as if the delivery truck it was on was a heater. The candy would be sticky, melting on to one another. This is definitely a great, organic candy (NO GELATIN IS IN THIS PRODUCT), but I would only buy it again if I am to receive the product in good condition. The quality doesn’t effect the taste whatsoever, though I’d still rather it not be in that state upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Imani Dixon

customer_reviews.title: These are delicious!
customer_reviews.text: They’re smooth and so flavorful, and I love Annie’s products so of course I had to try these . The whole family loves them ! I signed up for the subscribe and save but unfortunately my last one said it was undeliverable and I got a refund but my family and I are a bit bummed .. Other than that , this brand is our favorite from the one pot meals to the sweet treats and crackers Definitely my number one choice
customer_reviews.author: Sable

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the Fruit Juice?
customer_reviews.text: I was highly disappointed when I read the ingredient list. I felt like I was ripped off for paying about 50 cents a package for sugar & fillers. I expected more fruit juice in them. As I recall, pear juice used to be the number two ingredient, now it’s the fourth. Here is the start of the ingredient list: Organic Tapioca Syrup, Organic Cane Sugar, Organic Tapioca Syrup Solids and then, Pear Juice. I would expect a higher quality ingredient list from Annie’s & at this price point!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon E

customer_reviews.title: Annie’s Organic bunny fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: These Annie organic fruit snacks are pretty pricey treats but are incredible when compared to the other ingredients in the low grade non organic fruit snacks. I watch my sugar and calorie intake daily and have a pretty strict workout routine but buy these every so often given the flavor and nutrition. I don’t like the cheap versions that contain high fructose corn syrup and the other 30 compounds to make them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycoub

customer_reviews.title: Box Smelled Like Someones Old Basement
customer_reviews.text: The box I receieved smelled like it had been in someones stinky basement for 5 years. SUPER DUPER WEIRD. Return immediately and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Girl in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Halloween. Since I had never bought this before, I opened one packet as a taste test. The taste is ok but most of the batch was stuck together like it had been sitting in the hot sun for weeks. I had to throw most of it away. Too bad becasue it was ok as far as candy goes. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: magnolia

customer_reviews.title: This is now my new favorite snack I ate the whole box in three days
customer_reviews.text: Ok I love these gummies so much I will be completely honest and just say. I ATE THE WHOLE BOX OF 24 BAGGIES IN THREE DAYS! I truely am so hyped up by these gummies. Although they are a bit more expensive than other gummies the texture the ingredient quality the taste are all so perfect. Also they are vegan!! I never thought I would be writing such a raving review of gummies ever in my life but here I am writing this and there you are reading it. I can’t recommend highly enough, buy them just to try them at least they are just that good lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not regular gelatin??
customer_reviews.text: I read the ingredients and it's made out of tapioca. The texture is just... not right. When you chew them the texture is not what you expect. The taste is weak. Everything in each pack tastes the same. So everything in the berry pack tastes alike. Everything in the tropical pack tastes alike. And I can't quite identify what the flavors are. And they all feel greasy like they are loaded with vegetable oil. I cannot recommend this. A real waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ner_do_well

customer_reviews.title: Usually awesome. This batch was pretty gross.
customer_reviews.text: We love these bunny fruit snacks and get them pretty frequently. That said, this batch purchased here, was not good. These are usually the softest, most flavorful fruit snacks ever, but these were all stuck together inside each individual pack and alternated between being really slimy and really stale. This box seemed old or something.
customer_reviews.author: Karly N Little

customer_reviews.title: i recommend this product to everyone that is looking for a healthy fruit snack
customer_reviews.text: what i like about this product is that it comes that it comes with more packets of rabbit gummies and at the foodstore they have these small boxes of rabbit gummies and they are expensive. Its my first time eating these and they are very good and i love how they are organic its very hard to find organic fruit snacks near me. i would say these are one of the healthiest fruit snacks and im eating two packets.
customer_reviews.author: christa wiswesser

customer_reviews.title: Melted when opening.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these online to save some $ and when I got them, all of the fruit snacks in the boxes are all melted and sticky and stuck together. A total mess. what a waste, now if i give them to my kid i have to watch him and clean his hands. be careful. I don't know if they are melted from the weather or what, but the sticky fruit snacks are not as good as when dry.
customer_reviews.author: j_m_min

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting....about to expire
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I was just like you wanting to opt-in for a healthier and Organic snack. Especially when it comes to the kids. This product is unbelievably horrible, leaves an after taste, feels grainy in your mouth, and is going bad. Stay far away from this and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them At Costco
customer_reviews.text: These are a great snack and treat that my daughter loves. I've tried some, and they're quite tasty. My only complaint is that while your'e saving money on not buying individual boxes of these, you're also not saving as much as you should. A box with double the quantity costs the same as Costco. If you have a Costco membership or a service that will pick up from Costco (Instacart, for example), do that instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear Lena

customer_reviews.title: So delicious! A feel good snack :)
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and made from great ingredients!! I love gummies but since moving towards a plant based diet, I feared that I'd never be able to enjoy gummies again. I am so happy that I discovered Annie's brand bunny fruit snacks as thet are listed as Vegan!! They have an amazing chewy consistency and the variety of fruit flavors are out of this world! I am sad every time I get to the last one in the package, haha. So good, plant based, and all organic!
customer_reviews.author: LiliBelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazon doesn’t store them properly
customer_reviews.text: Love these fruit snacks, hate that the two times we’ve ordered, the packages are a sticky (maybe previously melted?), sometimes grainy mess. Is Amazon not storing these at the correct temperature? Thought it was a fluke, so I ordered again, but this is batch 2 with the same results...yuck. Can’t just open and give these to a toddler like the ones you buy in the store...just a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy but Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Ok so here’s the thing. these are the best fruit snacks ever and I started to run out so I ordered more. I usually don’t order them from amazon, but I thought “wow how convenient” while I love the fruit snacks I think that these maybe sat in a warm truck or warehouse too long because they are gooey and sticky. While they kept their shape and they taste the same, they are not very good for on the run because I have to wash my hands after I eat a pack. Probably will not order from amazon again, will have to stick to Walmart and Costco
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Faber

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. But it is just too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. But it is just too expensive. In the store, I can buy for $.50. The subscribe in save price is $.61. I've now decided to just switch to Welches because they are probably .$10 a pack. I just can't justify the cost any more.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hall

customer_reviews.title: These won't last long with kids around!
customer_reviews.text: I think the best way to judge how good a snack food is, is how long it sits on the shelf. These do not sit on the shelf long at all. We get them each month on our subscribe and save. Our three kids (and the neighbors kids) typically consume every one in under 2 days. The kids are so excited when the box comes, you'd think it was Christmas. I like them because they are healthier than the fruit snacks I typically buy at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin H. George

customer_reviews.title: Great for school lunches, less expensive than Whole foods
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves Annie's products. Purchasing through Amazon subscribe and save was a lot less expensive than buying at whole foods, even on sale. ( at least here in Hawaii) The products seems to have different texture / quality than the store product, I can only describe as a bit melty / sticky. Still great for school lunches and I will purchase again, just pack a napkin for those sticky hands!
customer_reviews.author: HawaiiAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Gotta try this gummies! They're not coated in weird garbage :)
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to these little suckers. I am a grown woman with no kids. I think they make my fingers too sticky to pick out of the package and eat one at a time, so I open it and squeeze the lot into my mouth. They taste better than Welch's or any other whatever coated gummy that makes them not sticky to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: missing a quarter of the packs is super disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Box 6 each of the four flavors. I'm missing all he orange ones. Only received 18 packs instead of 24. The box was sealed. For paying $15 for this box, missing a quarter of the packs is super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: srao

customer_reviews.title: Soft and tasty, but only 10 in package
customer_reviews.text: With a 5 year old I have tasted dozens of gummy brands on the market but always come back to Annie’s. 70 calories per pouch of which 11g is sugar. They are extremely soft, tangy and offer a days worth of vitamin C. Go to snack during cold season. With an average of 10 bunnies per pack they are rather small but great to throw in lunches. I love that only fruit dyes are used as my daughter is very sensative to artificial dyes.
customer_reviews.author: jill madison

customer_reviews.title: I adore these, but they definitely aren't for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I adore these, but they definitely aren't for everyone. Don't buy these expecting the typical texture of a gummy. They are almost more.. jello-esq. The flavor of them is absolutely wonderful though. Everyone that I had try them agreed the flavor was great but most of them couldn't get past the odd texture. I, however, love it, as they are much easier to chew then other gummies I have had.
customer_reviews.author: VeeyaMJ

customer_reviews.title: they're ok but greasy
customer_reviews.text: they taste fine, nothing special. they're very oily or greasy i'm assuming because of some plant based component unless they're just made to be that way. when i think of my favorite childhood gummies i think of those opaque princess gummies. these are not those by a long run but i knew that. i'd love them if they weren't so greasy in texture!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect these fruit snacks to be that good. I was WRONG. I always have to have these available for snacking, now. I wish there was a bit more in each pack, but maybe it's for the best that there isn't! It's fun to try the different flavors. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great snacks - but box is hard to open
customer_reviews.text: These candy snacks come in foil pouches which provide a good helping of the snack candy. They taste great and are easy on the teeth. Biggest problem - there's no easy access to the box they come in. Should have a perforation for easy access. Otherwise, I like them and will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fruit snack option!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (cough, my husband and I) loves these snack packs! They're delightful and a nice snack to toss in my bag for the kid (read: me). They're a little messy and things get sticky when consumed by the kid. They seem like a better option than the mainstream gummy snacks, but TBH I'm not looking into it all that much. I've now got it on my Subscribe and Save list and will see how long that lasts!
customer_reviews.author: KWalker17

customer_reviews.title: Our toddler's favorite snack!
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler loves this snack! He always reaches for it and gets excited when we open it for him. The amount is just right for his age and it's not too sweet. We have it on subscribe and save and we always stock it in our pantry. A must have for toddlers who love to snack!
customer_reviews.author: The Chetu

customer_reviews.title: Good Flavor
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and I love the fact that they are organic and by a company that I have bought food from before. This variety pack contains 24 pouches with four different flavors you can choose from. I tried these and while I enjoy the flavors, the consistency is a bit hard to get use to. They are squishy and hard at the same time. It is difficult to explain, though my kids seem not to mind it. The tend to be a good treat for my kids after a meal, or a small snack to hold them over until a meal time. I will likely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Corby

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these; dentists do not.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these, though my dentist would not like to hear that. We give these as a reward for our kiddos, and occasionally as a special treat. Else, we try not to overdo gummies because they're bad for teeth. The kids love them. It's fun to choose a color (4 flavors in this multipack), and the portions are small enough that I don't have to feel super guilty as a parent. I think the "organic" part makes me feel better, too.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Z.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Quick Snack Available - These Bunnies Are Not Just For Kids!
customer_reviews.text: My family is in love with the Annie's Organic Bunnies. They are my mom's favorite snack and we can't go more than a week without a new box. The flavor is unlike any other gummy fruit snack. It packs a real punch and doesn't taste like the other generic processed options. They are a great snack any time of day and I cannot recommend them enough. We will always come back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor D.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! My boys love getting fruit snacks as a little treat or thrown in for lunches, but its hard to find ones that are actually good for them. These don't have all that artificial crap in them!! Other organic fruit snacks we've tried were really chewy and hard or just tasted nasty. These are delicious, soft and taste better than the cheap crap you find in the snack isle. I try to feed my family organic food but it's not always possible with how expensive it gets, but these are a great price!! So the kids and mom is happy! Win win
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Pricing is not fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: Kiddos aren't crazy about these compared to Motta, but I knew that when I purchased. I was surprised at how small this box was. Definitely wasn't an amazing deal. I paid about $10 and Costco sells a much larger box for about the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organic snack option
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has always loved these Annie's Fruit Snacks! I was pleased to see there was a multi pack. These little pouches are perfect for "special treats" without being a HUGE treat. They are organic - which is important to us - but also have nothing artificial. I try to give my kids the cleanest, healthiest food, but every now and then, these are a nice treat. I will say my daughter likes these WAY more than Annie's Bunny Grahams.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Gummy Bunnies!🐰
customer_reviews.text: These fruit bunny gummies are delicious and addicting. There is no weird aftertaste, vegetable-based colors, natural ingredients, no crap. It's sweet, yummy, soft and chewy. I genuinely don't mind purchasing these gummies for loved ones. They're a much healthier choice if you're going to be eating candy at all.
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh! These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely amazing! I purchased these for my grandkids, but, I had to try them myself. Fruity, soft, yummy goodness! Better than any other fruit snack I've tasted. On top of all that, they are organic & no preservatives! I have 10 grandkids. This will be a healthy treat in my house.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kaplanek

customer_reviews.title: Best gummy fruit snack
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We love “fruit snacks” around here. With five little kids, snacks go away fast! But even the adults can agree, Annie’s are the best gummy. Smooth texture, amazing flavor, definitely worth going on subscribe and save!
customer_reviews.author: D. Ratz

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Purple and orange are my favorite. They're incredibly delicious—everyone in my family adores them. They're also super easy to carry around with you and don't melt in heat. Also they're made with natural ingredients AND they're vegetarian—no gelatin. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stern

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and cute
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old loves a good fruit snack and these are always in our rotation. They’re a little stickier than some, but I personally think they have a better flavor. She gobbles then like nobody’s business.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I’m typically not a fan of gummy anything but the flavor of these is pretty intense and makes them worthwhile. And they’re organic, so it’s perfect for a quick snack if I want a treat of some kind
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste: 10/10, but Texture: 6/10
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are not very chewy. I really like the taste, but they come apart in just a few bites. When I'm going for a gummy snack, I want something with a texture like a Haribo gummy product. I'm sure a lot of people may like this texture better though. I think they're worth a try, and they have a great fruit taste, just not my favorite gummy snack when I factor in the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My children are obsessed - so is my husband
customer_reviews.text: My children are obsessed - so is my husband!!!!! SO YUMMY!! Oh my gosh I could eat the whole box. We get these once a month for about a year now as special treats. They don't last too long in our house ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with some fruit snacks missing
customer_reviews.text: These fruit snacks taste amazing. I could probably eat the whole box in one sitting. The portions are fairly small, but I think this is on purpose. I love the ingredients, but honestly I bought them for the taste! I would not repurchase these through Amazon, however. The box arrived so beaten up that some of the packs of fruit snacks were missing. The box sadly just didn’t stand up to shipping. I’ve attached a picture - the shipping label was directly on the box of fruit snacks, which just wasn’t quite sturdy enough. I think if the box was a little tougher or maybe put inside another box it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light sugar snack
customer_reviews.text: I get sugar cravings every now and then. These are a perfect low calorie sugary snack. I really enjoyed them. Always arrived fresh and always tastes great. Not a single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner. Had them delivered to my niece in college. She paid they were packaged nicely. She loves this snack. Will buy again once students are allowed to return to the dorms .
customer_reviews.author: K Terese Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviewers stated: if you live in a hot climate they stick together making them almost impossible to take out of the bag. Flavor is great I just wish they didn't melt before you even get them.
customer_reviews.author: Taty

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for 4 year old grandkids that were visiting. They were perfect. The kids loved them and we could grab a package when we jumped in the car to go somewhere. What was fun was that their Mom said they were the tastiest gummies ever, and she buys lots of gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Mann

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and soft.
customer_reviews.text: These are a favorite snack of my two year old’s. They are super soft so she doesn’t choke on them or have difficulty chewing them. Great flavors and just the right portion sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good Snacks + Perfect Portion Size!
customer_reviews.text: Great little fruit snacks. I love the pack size, as it is perfect for my toddler. The snacks are delicious and have a nice texture too. Very pleased and will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: T. Karunanithy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The flavor wasn’t as present as with most fruit snacks. The portions were tiny and I found myself wishing I had just purchased regular fruit snacks at the grocery store or at Trader Joe’s. The texture was also not as expected- a lot more slippery and moist.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Tastiest Fruit Snacks Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these fruit snacks. They are soft, juicy, and tastier than the rubbery alernatives out there. I sometimes eat a pack as my treat. I guard them because my kids' friends go nuts for them, and can go through quite a few in one sitting! Because we really only eat this brand, I stock this in my kitchen all the time, and the best price I have found is here on Amazon. My kids like this assorted pack, which is not available anywhere else I have looked. If your kids must eat something sweet, and not fresh fruit, these are the best choice!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: VEGAN! What more can a mom ask for!
customer_reviews.text: Be wise to check expiration date they expire fairly quickly so I do not normally purchase these in bulk. However they are vegan and gluten free and very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Cedes86

customer_reviews.title: Delicious snacks
customer_reviews.text: Delicious snack option that is full of flavor and relatively healthy. The portion sizes are probably meant for kids, because my husband will eat at least two packages in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina A Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Small portions but packed with flavor
customer_reviews.text: These vegan snacks are delicious and really pack in the flavor! They are great for trips, snacks for kids, or even to show your wife how much you love her. The only minor complaint is how small the bags are, so you might end up eating two or three!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Basically crack for kids
customer_reviews.text: My children are obsessed with these. I know they are basically candy and have little nutritional value but my kids will do just about anything for a little bag of them. Put on their shoes and get in the car! Here! These are handy to keep in your purse for bribery- I mean incentives on the go. They are quite tasty!
customer_reviews.author: CZG

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Gummies were melted and extremely sticky (delivered on a cold rainy day). 5 other pantry products were delivered in the same box and have good quality. Not sure what happened, still taste okay but miserable to eat as most are stuck together and stick to your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sessa10

customer_reviews.title: Grilled Cheese
customer_reviews.text: While I love and trust the brand these fruit snacks came all melted together in each package. Not that the kids minded. Just should not be that way.
customer_reviews.author: M Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Merchandise was like glued together as if exposed to heat,
customer_reviews.text: The fruit bunny snacks are all smashed together as if they were exposed to heat, and I am not sure who is to blame, but I expect these to be replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Stlpsych

customer_reviews.title: Slammin Vegan Snacks
customer_reviews.text: The gf was looking for some Vegan gummy snacks and whadoyaknow these happen to be accidentally vegan (? I guess is the phrase). I'm not a vegan but I enjoy these gummy snacks the same. Nice fruity flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great option!
customer_reviews.text: Better, slightly healthier alternative to the normal fruit snacks out there! I get them as a subscription once a month. Perfect for the occasional sweet tooth craving.
customer_reviews.author: SABII

customer_reviews.title: Trying to get the kids to eat this is tricky
customer_reviews.text: While I am all for organic and family owned businesses, these "gummies" did not pass my kid's test. I have to admit the texture of these snacks is a bit off. For some reason, my kids love the Welch's version which are more like the standard gummy flavor and chewiness. Originally, these Annie's snacks were meant to be a replacement for the the Welch, but that didn't go so well. My kids are somewhat picky, but from an adult perspective, I can't say I love these either. Plus, the sticky residue at the end is rather annoying, as well.
customer_reviews.author: David Peng

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great Organic Snacks for toddlers. I used them in my daughters preschool lunches. There are four different flavors which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A. Deal

customer_reviews.title: Better choice than regular gummies
customer_reviews.text: These have a wonderful flavor and they are fun to eat. I do not feel bad giving these to my Grandson. My only reason for not giving stars are the price. I just do not feel like your getting enough product for the price. But they are organic .....
customer_reviews.author: Custom Saddle Seller

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great but makes me fart
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't taste like other fruit snacks (in a good way)! Unfortunately I bloat when I eat these, but then again I have a sensitive stomach (lactose intolerant, can't drink cold water, eat raw veggies, etc.), so if you have a hardier stomach, give these a try!
customer_reviews.author: rgg1909

customer_reviews.title: Soft and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: The best organic gummies I've ever had. Really like the strawberry ones! Love this brands products and love that there is no gelatin.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Teacher's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: As an adult, these are mine and I hide them from the kids! The only gummies I'll eat, and as a preschool teacher I've pretty much had them ALL.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: I like Welches better ....READ ..........🕹
customer_reviews.text: These are good & have a high quality texture to them but I like the flavor of the Welches’ better. Some of the flavors in these are just a little weird tasting. These are smoother on the tongue & are more patatible. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone of any age! Yum
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Great flavor and the bunnies are adorable. My son likes to eat the head first...🙄 Typical 5 year old..lol perfect for school lunches and snack time. No artificial flavor No artificial colors No preservatives! All the more reason I love these! My husband even likes them too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and have ingredients I am good with my kids eating. They are kind of sticky in your hand though. Does not impact the taste, but it is an little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting these monthly for about a year now. Never stale, always consistently good taste. I use them as a snack when I cycle for a quick pick me up. I wish each packet had about 20% of the bunnies in them.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great organic fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: Great organic fruit snacks with no dies or artificial coloring which is important to us. The taste is great and our daughter loves them
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Who doesnt love these??
customer_reviews.text: My son's favorite. Love that they are organic. I got during prime day deals, so I got a really good price. Its nice stocking up with the big pack, so I dont have to go out and buy so often.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Hiticas

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere near as good as the sour bunnies. BEWARE the green ones are not sour they're tropical, nasty surprise. The berry flavor is the best and they're all downhill from there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Pouches
customer_reviews.text: All the Tropical Fruit snack pouches were compressed with no air in the pouches. The tropical flavored fruit snack pouches (6 total) are inedible. The snacks are melting, very gooey and one pouch was punctured. The punctured pouch leaked onto other pouches which made them sticky and had to be wiped clean.
customer_reviews.author: Terri K

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the food
customer_reviews.text: The individual packets inside the box had different sell by dates most of the packets were all sticky. I would not but from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori G.

customer_reviews.title: Too tart and sticky for my liking.
customer_reviews.text: After opening the 1st couple of packs I decided that I didn't like them. After getting used to them, I changed my mind after they grew on me. Now I only think they are OK. I can't say that they are bad, just not what I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Wylde Stile

customer_reviews.title: Update: Grandkids love these snacks
customer_reviews.text: Update: The 2nd ingredient is Cane Sugar. Organic yes but way too much sugar for a kids snack. Won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Loves To Read

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are more natural. They taste great, and the portion size is great. Keeps me from overdoing it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: No artificial, but not a health food.
customer_reviews.text: For my grandson. Only the best. I purchase these and one other brand (YummyEarth) of treats because I do not approve of artificial dyes/flavors/sweetners/anything. I have to say that these really are NOT a healthy food choice (SUGAR).. but when a treat is called for, I DO recommend the least artificial you can find, always. I also have to say that while he likes these, his favorites are the YummyEarth gummies. I just get these so he has a choice. I "vote" with my purchases and support companies that offer healthier choices.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again for this price.  Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, after reading all the stellar reviews, I was expecting better. Sure its mostly organic and natural, but the taste itself isn't vastly different from a traditional super cheap gummy, and it still is heavy on the tapioca syrup and sugar, with the actual fruit products way down the list (if you can call them fruit products and not just flavor extractions). Its good, and its organic, but I am not impressed for the price, and would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: The gummies stick together in the package but the flavor is great, there's no gelatin, and they're lower cals than rival products. My favorite flavor are the mixed berries and strawberry packs.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Montano

customer_reviews.title: Sure to please the Vegan in your Life!
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest, though I've never myself tried this product, one of my dearest friends who is a vegan and loves this stuff absolutely can't get enough of it. With Mother's Day coming up I ordered this and a few other items that are on her okay to eat vegan list and she was over the moon excited about receiving this. So with that alone, I'm giving it 5 stars because it made her day and she loves the product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ghirarda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The consistency of these was just off putting. Flavor was ok but my grandson wouldn't eat them because they weren't like others he has had
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Lambrecht

customer_reviews.title: Portion size is small but quality is goooood!
customer_reviews.text: Taste quality and ingredients appear it compared to most manufacturers! If you like fruit candy these will probably make you happy!
customer_reviews.author: Carington Family

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the brand Annie's so I had a feeling these were going to be good. I'm loving that these are organic, non-GMO and free of high fructose corn syrup. Im happy that these are softer than the usual fruit snacks you can buy as I have sensitive teeth. I put a pack in my purse when I go out to avoid temptation, these are so flavorful and fruity that my family uses them to satisfy their sweet cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie719

customer_reviews.title: They are too soft and feel a little artificial...
customer_reviews.text: I thought that these will be more chewable, but the snacks are so soft, they almost melt in your mouth; there is just not much to enjoy and chew. Also, even though these are marketed as healthy and made out of 100% natural ingredients, they left a somewhat artificial taste in my mouth; it basically didn't feel like a healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: K. Witek

customer_reviews.title: There are many better fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: There are many better fruit snacks, these are more gelatinous than others, and are extremely acidic compared to others. I support Annie's as a company and enjoy most of their products but these fruit snacks are not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Sluyter

product_meta.title: Annie's Organic Bunny Fruit Snacks, Variety Pack, Gluten Free, Vegan, 24 ct
product_meta.description: Color:1 PackLunch packing and snacking have never been easier with this variety pack containing 24 pouches of Annie’s Bunny Fruit Snacks. Featuring four mouth-watering flavors (Berry Patch, Summer Strawberry, Sunny Citrus & Tropical Treat), these organic, crave-able cuties pack bold natural fruit flavors into fun bunny shapes and are equal parts adorable as they are delicious.
feature_bullets: FRUIT SNACKS: Certified Organic, these gluten free bunny-shaped fruit snacks are made with real fruit juice and packed with 100% daily value of vitamin C.
REAL INGREDIENTS: No artificial flavors, synthetic colors, or high fructose corn syrup.
CERTIFIED ORGANIC: Made with real organic fruit juice. Certified organic ingredients are grown without persistent pesticides.
VEGAN & GLUTEN FREE: Annie's organic fruit snacks are naturally vegan & gluten free.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
